title: Pinnacle Federal Credit Union
Page_Title: Pinnacle Federal Credit Union I Personal and Business Banking
Meta_Description: Pinnacle Federal Credit Union strives to meet its members' expectations by providing checking accounts, savings accounts, share certificates, retirement accounts, and specialty accounts.

content: Since 1962, Pinnacle Federal Credit Union has been a trusted, non-profit financial partner to members in Edison, NJ, and the surrounding Middlesex County. They've developed from humble beginnings in the local community to a full-service banking institution in Edison with 300 employer organizations and members from New Jersey, New York, and Pennsylvania in over 50+ years of service. It is the 25th biggest credit union in New Jersey, with assets reaching $115.3 million and more than 12,000 members.
You work for or are a member of one of their Employer Groups.
If you work for or have retired from one of the firms, organizations, or associations, or if you live in the Georgia counties, you are eligible to join Pinnacle.
Membership is accessible to any family members of active Pinnacle members who are connected by blood, marriage, or adoption.
That means your spouse, wife, children, grandparents, grandchildren, aunts, uncles, nieces, nephews, and in-laws may all join now and enjoy the benefits of banking with Pinnacle.
To start a credit union account, the following documents are normally required.
</br>
A valid Georgia driver's license or picture ID card
Additional address verification may be necessary.
A legitimate Social Security number in the United States (physical card for youth accounts)
</br>
Please bring a salary stub from one of the SEG groups with you.
Alternatively, a job offer letter.

link.label: Refer to the link for more details

content: This account requires a minimum deposit of $5 from your basic savings account; there is no monthly cost for the Savings account.
Pinnacle Federal Credit Union provides checking accounts, savings accounts, share certificates, retirement accounts, and, specialty accounts
The Pinnacle Federal Credit Union is a financial cooperative. The Union offers loans, investments, savings, credit and debit cards, internet banking, and other financial services.
Since they're a non-profit organization, their revenues are returned to members in the form of lower lending rates, more interest paid on deposits, and fewer fees.

Your funds are federally insured up to $250,000 and guaranteed by the full confidence and credit of the United States Government, courtesy of the National Credit Union Administration, a U.S. Government Agency. Pinnacle Credit Union is a home lender that welcomes all applicants.

It is rare for businesses to be able to provide employee perks at no expense to your company or the employees themselves. Give your employees access to a fantastic employee perk by allowing them to join Pinnacle Federal Credit Union. They are delighted to offer competitive dividend rates on savings, cheap lending rates, and little expenses.
They have made it our goal to deliver low-cost services and solutions that assist their members in achieving and maintaining financial stability.
